!4 Open Sidebar and check if it is visible
|storyboard|browser test                                    |
|Toggle the sidebar                                         |
|ensure    |is visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'sidebar'])|
|# Check if visible on other pages                          |
|click     |xpath=(//a[@href= 'TestSuiteDemo'])             |
|ensure    |is visible on page|xpath=(//div[@id= 'sidebar'])|
